This tool enables pages insertion from arbitrary pdf document. After item is selected, dialog is opened. This dialog works in 3 steps:
Select file which pages we want to insert. When file is selected, Open button should be pressed. Then the midle part is enabled and current top part is disabled (file can't be changed after Open is pressed).
Select which pages to insert from right items list to the left list in which there are pages from current document. Use << button to move currently selected page from right list to left (before selected item in left list). If you want't to move page back, use >> button. Inserted pages can be moved in left list by Up and down buttons.
Original pages (in left list) can't be moved or removed.
Items lists enables also multiselection
When all pages which we want to insert are on their positions among pages from current document, press OK button for insertion start. You can press Cancel button anytime to skip this dialog. TODO add image of dialog

This tool enables to delinearize pdf files. When menu option is pressed, file open dialog is displayed. Linearized pdf file should be selected. After open file is selected, save dialog is opened for output (delinearized) file. After both files are selected, delinearization process starts. This may fail, if input file is not linearized or it is not valid pdf document and process ends with error dialog.
